root.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear Mission Pack - Urban Operations
root.description: PlotStep into a counter-terrorist operators worst nightmare...a fire-fight in a densely populated area. Stray rounds could mean civilian casualties, and terrorists can hide amidst the frenzy of panicked on-lookers. Tenement housing in Mexico City, the London Tube System, the pulsing markets in Istanbul, or a hotel in Hong Kong. Team up with John Clark and newly appointed Intel Officer Kevin Sweeney as they take you into these concrete jungles, where you'll experience the most difficult and harrowing missions that RAINBOW has ever faced.
